attributes.action: Save our Local school.  Pott Row First School.  Reference number 120873
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Locals are upset that the local council wants to close Pott Row school, many of those describing it as a happy school with excellent results – as backed up by Ofsted inspections.
Copy this link to read the Ofsted report.

Go to ofsted and look for Pott Row school

Pott row not only has brilliant Ofsted reports but it is the first school in the eastern region to reach level 5 of the RHS Campaign for School Gardening Benchmarking scheme.

They have an established school garden that has grown over the years to include raised beds for vegetables, built by the local rotary club, a sensory garden built by volunteer parents,  a mini orchard, a wildlife garden with pond, a bird garden and a new music garden.

Please do not break these childrens hearts and close this school.  They have put in so many hours into making it what it is.
